title: A Demon's Blade
description: When Mona was six years old, she witnessed the death of her mother… by a Demon. Mona was told what she saw was impossible, but she always knew the truth, nothing would convince her otherwise; not even pesky little things like doctors or psychologists.  It’s been 12 years, 8 foster homes, 5 schools and 2 crappy part-time jobs since then, but now the monsters are back, and they’re everywhere.  Suddenly Mona finds herself in a world which she never knew existed and hunted by a creature like the one plaguing her nightmares.  Luckily, Mona isn’t alone. But will the help of her new friends, be enough to save her?  - This is a full novel. Book 1 of The Desdemona Chronicles. - This book is a RH Novel.
author: Cece Rose
